name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Front-End Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Excels in **React**, **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and frameworks like **Nx monorepo** and **React Query**, with a strong emphasis on **Tailwind** and **SCSS** for modern user interface design. Demonstrated ability in performance optimization and user experience design, ensuring applications are both efficient and engaging. 
Proficient in testing frameworks such as **Cypress**, **Jest**, and component libraries like **Storybook**, facilitating high-quality code and robust user interactions. Experienced in Agile methodologies, fostering collaboration and effective communication within cross-functional teams. Additionally, holds hands-on expertise in backend development with **Node.js** and in building AI/ML-powered platforms, augmenting capabilities in automated processes and real-time data handling.
